show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
You Know It’s Time … to Free Your Mind! <!--more--> So, what news story got you all riled up this week that you’d like to share and talk about?
Select one from the 3 million or so that ought to be swimming around in your head this bumper-crop news week and offer it up with all the gusto you can.
It’s “Free Your Mind Friday” on Leid Stories, after all, and we’re waiting to hear what you have to say.
Call 888-874-4888, stand firmly on your soapbox, and opine away.
But don’t be surprised if someone finds holes in your argument.
It’s just their way of freeing their minds!
